name: classroom_courses_announcements_get
description: Returns an announcement. This method returns the following error codes: * `PERMISSION_DENIED` if the requesting user is not permitted to access the requested course or announcement, or for access errors. * `INVALID_ARGUMENT` if the request is malformed. * `NOT_FOUND` if the requested course or announcement does not exist.

courseId.description: Identifier of the course. This identifier can be either the Classroom-assigned identifier or an alias.

fields.description: Selector specifying which fields to include in a partial response.

key.description: API key. Your API key identifies your project and provides you with API access, quota, and reports. Required unless you provide an OAuth 2.0 token.

oauth_token.description: OAuth 2.0 token for the current user.

prettyPrint.description: Returns response with indentations and line breaks.

quotaUser.description: Available to use for quota purposes for server-side applications. Can be any arbitrary string assigned to a user, but should not exceed 40 characters.

$block: Announcement created by a teacher for students of the course

$ul: **alternateLink**: Absolute link to this announcement in the Classroom web UI. This is only populated if `state` is `PUBLISHED`. Read-only.
**assigneeMode**: Assignee mode of the announcement. If unspecified, the default value is `ALL_STUDENTS`.
**creationTime**: Timestamp when this announcement was created. Read-only.
**creatorUserId**: Identifier for the user that created the announcement. Read-only.
**id**: Classroom-assigned identifier of this announcement, unique per course. Read-only.
**individualStudentsOptions**: Assignee details about a coursework/announcement. This field is set if and only if `assigneeMode` is `INDIVIDUAL_STUDENTS`.
**studentIds**: Identifiers for the students that have access to the coursework/announcement.
**materials**: Additional materials. Announcements must have no more than 20 material items.
**scheduledTime**: Optional timestamp when this announcement is scheduled to be published.
**state**: Status of this announcement. If unspecified, the default state is `DRAFT`.
**text**: Description of this announcement. The text must be a valid UTF-8 string containing no more than 30,000 characters.
**updateTime**: Timestamp of the most recent change to this announcement. Read-only.
